name: DigitalMR
desc: Sentiment and topic data for social media posts in any language.
sectors: Autos, Consumer, Financial Services, Healthcare, Insurance, Restaurants & Food Delivery, Retail, Telecom
data_delivery: Raw, Platform Based, Research Reports, Custom Analysis
pricing_structure: pricing is based on vertical including all competitors in a specific language
dataset_coverage_start: 2006 (twitter), most other sources at least 36 months historical data
why_us?: data relevance and annotation accuracy >80% in any language
advantages: higher accuracy, ability to integrate social intelligence with sales, and survey data
use_cases: commercial due diligence before acquisition, performance improvement of portfolio companies, due diligence of a portfolio company before exit
